description: Add Only Flag.  Indicates that the service is an add only, not an update.

Specialty_ParentObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Specialty_ParentObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Specialty_ParentObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

description: A unique identifier used to reference a Specialty

Specialty_Data.description: The name of a Specialty.  The name combined with the code must be unique.
An alphanumeric identifier for the Specialty.  The code combined with the name must be unique.
When true, prevents the specialty from being used during ad-hoc certification creation.
Indicates if the Specialty is inactive.  If inactive, it cannot be added to a certification.
A URL associated with the Specialty

Specialty_ChildObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Specialty_ChildObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Specialty_ChildObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Specialty_Data.description: Provides references to each Subspecialty associated with the Specialty.

description: Contains the detailed information about a Specialty

validation.validation: You must first select Enable Specialties for Certifications on the Maintain Skills and Experience Setup task.
